prompts.title: Job Description Generator
prompts.description: Create compelling, inclusive job descriptions that attract top talent.
prompts.template: Create a comprehensive job description for a [job title] position at our [company type] company. Department: [department]. Generate: 1) Engaging job summary, 2) 8-10 key responsibilities, 3) Required qualifications, 4) Skills assessment criteria, 5) Compensation range highlights, 6) Company culture elements, 7) Inclusive language review.

prompts.title: Interview Question Bank
prompts.description: Develop behavioral and technical interview questions that reveal candidate fit.
prompts.template: Create an interview question bank for [job title] candidates. Company: [industry/type]. Generate: 1) 15 behavioral questions using STAR method, 2) 8 situational questions, 3) 5 culture fit questions, 4) Technical assessment questions, 5) Follow-up probing questions, 6) Red flag responses to watch for, 7) Scoring rubric.

prompts.title: Employee Engagement Survey
prompts.description: Design comprehensive surveys that drive actionable insights.
prompts.template: Create an employee engagement survey for our [company size] [industry] company. Survey goals: [what you want to measure]. Design: 1) 25 questions across key engagement drivers, 2) Mix of rating scales and open-ended questions, 3) Department-specific follow-ups, 4) Communication plan for launch, 5) Analysis framework for results.

prompts.title: Performance Review Framework
prompts.description: Create fair, comprehensive performance evaluation systems.
prompts.template: Design a performance review framework for [job level] employees. Review cycle: [frequency]. Create: 1) Self-assessment questionnaire, 2) Manager evaluation criteria, 3) Goal-setting templates, 4) Development planning section, 5) Feedback conversation guides, 6) Performance improvement plans, 7) Recognition and reward criteria.

promptTemplates.title: Job Description Generator
promptTemplates.description: Create compelling, inclusive job descriptions that attract top talent.
promptTemplates.prompt: Create a comprehensive job description for a [job title] position at our [company type] company. Department: [department]. Reporting to: [manager title]. Company size: [number] employees. Generate: 1) Engaging job summary that highlights growth opportunities, 2) 8-10 key responsibilities with specific outcomes, 3) Required qualifications (must-haves vs nice-to-haves), 4) Skills assessment criteria for interviews, 5) Compensation range and benefits highlights, 6) Company culture elements that appeal to top talent, 7) Inclusive language review and suggestions. Focus on attracting [specific talent type: diverse candidates/experienced professionals/early career]. Remote work: [yes/no/hybrid].

promptTemplates.title: Interview Question Bank
promptTemplates.description: Develop behavioral and technical interview questions that reveal candidate fit.
promptTemplates.prompt: Create an interview question bank for [job title] candidates. Company: [industry/type]. Key competencies needed: [list 4-5 competencies]. Generate: 1) 15 behavioral questions using STAR method framework, 2) 8 situational questions specific to this role, 3) 5 culture fit questions aligned with our values: [list values], 4) Technical assessment questions (if applicable), 5) Follow-up probing questions for each category, 6) Red flag responses to watch for, 7) Scoring rubric for consistent evaluation. Include questions that assess [specific qualities: leadership/problem-solving/adaptability]. Experience level: [entry/mid/senior].
promptTemplates.example:
BEHAVIORAL QUESTIONS:

1. 'Tell me about a time you had to learn a new skill quickly to complete a project.'
Follow-up: 'What specific steps did you take?'
Look for: Self-directed learning, resourcefulness
Red flag: Blaming others, making excuses...
tips: Include your current interview success rate for context
Mention any specific role requirements or challenges
Specify your company's core values and culture

promptTemplates.title: Employee Engagement Survey
promptTemplates.description: Design comprehensive employee engagement surveys that drive actionable insights.
promptTemplates.prompt: Create an employee engagement survey for our [company size] [industry] company. Current engagement challenge: [specific issue]. Survey goals: [what you want to measure]. Design: 1) 25 questions across key engagement drivers (leadership, growth, recognition, work-life balance), 2) Mix of rating scales, multiple choice, and open-ended questions, 3) Department-specific follow-up questions, 4) Anonymous vs. identified response options, 5) Communication plan for survey launch, 6) Analysis framework for results, 7) Action planning template for managers. Target response rate: [percentage]. Survey frequency: [timing].
promptTemplates.example:
LEADERSHIP QUESTIONS:

1. How often does your manager provide clear direction and expectations? (1-5 scale)
2. My manager supports my professional development (Strongly Agree to Strongly Disagree)
3. What's one thing your manager could do differently to better support you? (Open-ended)...
tips: Include your current engagement scores for benchmarking
Mention any recent organizational changes affecting morale
Specify your preferred survey tools or platforms

promptTemplates.title: Performance Review Framework
promptTemplates.description: Create structured performance review processes that develop employees and drive results.
promptTemplates.prompt: Design a performance review framework for [job level: entry/mid/senior] employees in [department]. Review period: [quarterly/annual]. Company focus: [growth/retention/development]. Create: 1) Goal-setting template with SMART criteria, 2) Competency evaluation matrix for this role, 3) 360-feedback collection process, 4) Self-assessment questions that promote reflection, 5) Manager evaluation guidelines with examples, 6) Development planning template, 7) Compensation discussion framework, 8) Follow-up schedule and check-ins. Address these performance challenges: [list 2-3 common issues].
promptTemplates.example:
GOAL SETTING TEMPLATE:

SMART Goal Example:
'Increase customer satisfaction scores from 4.2 to 4.6 by Q4 through implementing new onboarding process and conducting monthly check-ins'

Specific: Customer satisfaction improvement
Measurable: 4.2 to 4.6 score
Achievable: Based on benchmark data...
tips: Include your current performance review completion rates
Mention any performance management software you use
Specify your company's promotion and development criteria

promptTemplates.title: HR Policy Creator
promptTemplates.description: Draft comprehensive HR policies that protect the company and support employees.
promptTemplates.prompt: Create an HR policy for [policy type: remote work/PTO/harassment/etc.] for our [company size] company in [location/industry]. Legal requirements: [specific compliance needs]. Company culture: [values/approach]. Draft: 1) Policy statement and purpose, 2) Scope and who it applies to, 3) Detailed procedures and guidelines, 4) Employee responsibilities and expectations, 5) Manager/HR responsibilities, 6) Reporting and escalation processes, 7) Consequences for policy violations, 8) Review and update schedule. Ensure compliance with [relevant laws/regulations]. Tone: [formal/approachable/conversational].
promptTemplates.example:
REMOTE WORK POLICY

PURPOSE:
This policy establishes guidelines for remote work arrangements that maintain productivity, collaboration, and work-life balance while supporting our company's flexibility values.

SCOPE:
Applies to all full-time employees after 90-day probationary period...
tips: Include any existing policies that need updating
Mention your legal review process for new policies

faqs.question: Are these prompts legally compliant for HR use?
faqs.answer: The prompts help you create HR content, but all policies and processes should be reviewed by legal counsel before implementation. We recommend working with employment lawyers familiar with your jurisdiction.

faqs.question: Can I use these prompts for different company sizes?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! The prompts are designed to work for startups through enterprise companies. Simply specify your company size and industry for tailored recommendations that match your complexity needs.

faqs.question: How do these prompts help with diversity and inclusion?
faqs.answer: Many prompts include specific guidance on inclusive language, bias reduction, and diverse candidate attraction. They help create more equitable processes while maintaining legal compliance.
